title: Prices Reduced further - T202 end panels individually + discounts on larger purchases

posts.post_title: Prices Reduced further - T202 end panels individually + discounts on larger purchases
posts.post_content:
I have the following cards available for purchase. Shipping will be $3.00. Accepting Paypal only.

The discounts below will be based upon the overall amount of cards purchased from any of the 9 separate listings I have posted in this category, 'E' cards and the 1920 to 1949 category, not just within this listing.

Looking to sell the cards in my various listings I am posting, so I am offering the following discounts for larger purchases: 

Buy 3 or more cards, free shipping
Buy 6 or more cards, 10% off 
Buy 12 or more, 15% off. Commitment to buy snags these cards, and I will ship promptly and securely in a padded envelope. PM's preferred.


T202 end panels
